node.title: Could you afford to spend $300 a week on COVID tests just so you could work?
node.alt: Police direct traffic at a border checkpoint.
node.description: Thousands of people in the Queensland-New South Wales border zone fear they will have to pay through the nose just to get to their jobs.
node.content:
["Thousands of people living in the Queensland-New\u00a0South Wales border zone fear they will have to pay hundreds of dollars a fortnight just to commute to work once the border\u00a0reopens.", "At 80 per cent of people\u00a0double dosed, Queensland's air and road border will open to anyone from a declared hotspot if they are fully vaccinated.", "But they must return\u00a0a negative COVID test in the previous 72 hours, according to the state government's roadmap.", "\"If you read the rule book at the moment, it looks like if you want to cross over you need a swab every three days,\" Tweed GP Matt Cardone said.", "\"It's about $150 to pay for a private swab without any Medicare backing.", "", "
Dr Cardone runs a Tweed Heads medical centre but commutes from his home on the Gold Coast.(Supplid: Matt Cardone)
", "COVID-19 tests are free if you have symptoms or have potentially been exposed to a positive case, but are not covered by Medicare when the test is for travel purposes.", "Dr Cardone lives on the Gold Coast but runs a medical clinic at Tweed Heads and is one of 15,000 to 16,000\u00a0daily commuters currently driving through the checkpoints around Coolangatta.", "Queensland police are expecting the number of\u00a0vehicles to double when the border roads reopen on December 17.", "", "
COVID tests conducted for travel requirements are not eligible for a Medicare rebate.(AAP: Luis Ascui)
", "
If\u00a0tests must happen, make them free
", "NSW Cross Border Commissioner James McTavish said he was\u00a0still waiting on advice from the Queensland government about\u00a0a number of elements of the upcoming border rules, but his understanding was\u00a0that tests would be needed.", "\"We'd like to see fully vaccinated people being exempted from that requirement entirely if they're from that border region,\" he said.", "", "
James McTavish said Queensland's\u00a0testing regime for border zone commuters was \"a little over the top\".(The Drum)
", "Mr McTavish said if the testing regime was enforced then it should be free for border residents.", "\"The financial impost of north of $600 a fortnight for somebody who's on\u00a0even a good wage \u2014 that's substantial,\" he said.", "", "
Annastacia Palaszczuk told Parliament today she makes no apologies for Queensland's strict requirements.(Supplied: Queensland Parliament)
", "In Parliament, Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk defended the strict requirements.", "\"When I travelled over to Tokyo, I had to undertake these tests too,\" Ms Palaszczuk said, but admitted she did not pay for the tests because they were work related.", "\"These are the strong requirements we have put in place to keep people safe.\"", "", "
Laura Gerber says\u00a0border zone residents shouldn't have to pay to be tested.(AAP: Glenn Hunt)
", "
No word on border bubble
", "LNP member for Currumbin Laura Gerber, whose electorate extends to the borderline, said locals were anxious.", "\"It feels like the border community has just simply been forgotten,\" Ms Gerber said", "\"We're a little footnote on that roadmap that says that there'll be further special directions for the border community, but nothing has been announced.", "A Queensland Health spokesperson said the state was\u00a0continuing to work through the specific requirements that border zone residents would need to meet to cross the border at that time.", "\"Special arrangements may be put in place for cross-border communities,\" the spokesperson said.", "\"The details of a possible border zone will be made public when available.\"", "", "
COVID cases surging across several European countries
"]
